languages.text: "Краски в твой душе изменились. Они буйствуют водоворотом многоцветий... Притягательно и жутко одновременно".
"The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."
languages.original_text: "Краски в твой душе изменились. Они буйствуют водоворотом многоцветий... Притягательно и жутко одновременно".

traits.locale_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你灵魂之中的颜色变了。那些颜色在色彩的漩涡中怒号……真是既迷人、又不祥。”
languages.original_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."

traits.locale_text: “你灵魂之中的颜色变了。那些颜色在色彩的漩涡中怒号……真是既迷人、又不祥。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Les couleurs de votre âme ont changé. C'est maintenant un tourbillon de nuances aussi séduisantes que sinistres. »
languages.original_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."

traits.locale_text: « Les couleurs de votre âme ont changé. C'est maintenant un tourbillon de nuances aussi séduisantes que sinistres. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Los colores de su alma han cambiado. Son un torbellino furioso de colores... tan atractivo como siniestro».
languages.original_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."

traits.locale_text: «Los colores de su alma han cambiado. Son un torbellino furioso de colores... tan atractivo como siniestro».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの魂の色が変わりつつあります。色相の渦で荒れ狂っている…魅力と邪悪が同時に存在しています」
languages.original_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの魂の色が変わりつつあります。色相の渦で荒れ狂っている…魅力と邪悪が同時に存在しています」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Farben in Eurer Seele haben sich verändert. Sie wüten in einem Wirbel der Töne und Schattierungen ... Attraktiv und bedrohlich gleichermaßen."
languages.original_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."

traits.locale_text: "Die Farben in Eurer Seele haben sich verändert. Sie wüten in einem Wirbel der Töne und Schattierungen ... Attraktiv und bedrohlich gleichermaßen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."

languages.text: "Ruhundaki renkler değişmiş. Tonların kasırgasında dönüp duruyorlar. Hem çekici hem de tekinsizler."
languages.original_text: "The colours in your soul have changed. They rage in a whirlpool of hues... Attractive and sinister at the same time."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhundaki renkler değişmiş. Tonların kasırgasında dönüp duruyorlar. Hem çekici hem de tekinsizler."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
